actions.description: Creates a new task on the specified task list.
actions.name: createTask

properties.description: Title of the new task to be created.
properties.label: Title
properties.name: title

properties.description: ID of the list where the new task will be stored.
properties.label: List ID
properties.name: listId

actions.title: Create Task

actions.description: Returns all tasks in the specified task list.
actions.name: listTasks

properties.description: ID of the list where tasks are stored.
properties.label: List ID
properties.name: listId

properties.description: Show also completed tasks. By default both completed task and task that needs action will be shown.
properties.label: Show completed
properties.name: showCompleted

actions.title: List Tasks

actions.description: Updates a specific task on the specified task list.
actions.name: updateTask

properties.description: ID of the list where specific task is stored.
properties.label: List ID
properties.name: listId

properties.description: ID of the task to update.
properties.label: Task ID
properties.name: taskId

properties.description: Title of the task to be updated. If empty, title will not be changed.
properties.label: Title
properties.name: title

properties.description: Status of the task. If empty, status will not be changed.
properties.label: Status
properties.name: status

properties.description: Notes describing the task. If empty, notes will not be changed.
properties.label: Notes
properties.name: notes

actions.title: Update Task

description: Google Tasks is a cloud-based task management tool that allows users to create, edit, and organize to-do lists, set deadlines, and track tasks across devices in real-time.
